reviewText: I love getting 4 movies for the price of 1 especially if the set has movies I would have bought separately anyway, this is one of those sets, Slaughter High is a classic 80's revenge slasher, My Best Friend is a Vampire is a really fun 80's fish out of water flick about a teenager who has to adjust and learn the ways of the modern Vampire after being bitten by one, with the help of his 300 year old mentor. Silent Night, Deadly Night 3 I actually really enjoyed, a blind girl is being stalked by a lobotomized killer she was psychically linked to while he was in a coma, file under trashy fun. I haven't watched Repossessed yet, having caught some of it on cable in the past I'm in no rush, but the other 3 are worthwhile flicks and make a nice addition to my collection.
Title: N/A

reviewText: what else can I say about this 4 movie special it is really worth buying if you trully love great horror movies especially the ones from the early 80's when scary movies were really at thier best. So, again this film collection is just wonderful to have all the time.
summary: wow couldn't believe the great movies on this disc!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Well, got your attention didn't it?  All of these are fun, mostly, and semi-spook-silly.  I LOVE the first, My Best Friend Is a Vampire.  Very reminiscent of ALL of those teen horror/comedy films.  Repossessed is okay, I gave it a three because of many talents in it -- Though it clarified why Linda Blair hasn't been in many successful films.  It's a rip at Exorcist, and I might add a sad one at that.  Slaughter High was a film I hadn't seen before.  I liked it, but, that is about all.  Caution though, it has both male and female (FF) nudity.  I kept waiting for it to surprises me and the surprise was IONO what happened.  LOL  All of them but Silent Night, Deadly Night 3 has subtitles in English for the deaf.  I don't know why one isn't or at least captioned but it is annoying at least.
summary: A Vampire Walks Into A Bar...
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was familiar with Repossessed.  It's a great comedy.  My Best Friend is A Vampire was also very good.  The other two movies weren't quite to my taste but as a combo of movies it wasn't bad.
summary: My Best Friend is A Vampire/ Repossessed
Title: N/A

reviewText: These movies from Lionsgate are available at a fair price, but they reuse old transfers (likely from original video sources). They are not remastered at all, and are all presented full-frame only. I would not recommend the set unless you are a fan of one of the films. I don't expect perfection from older films, but if Severin, Code Red or even Anchor Bay had released these, they would probably be properly framed at least.
summary: Movies are OK, but full-frame only...

reviewText: I enjoyed the entire experience and the movies. From comedy to terror it was a fun experience . Thanks for the ride.
